sloppy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: His written reports are incredibly sloppy.
sloppy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: sloppy clothes are loose-fitting, untidy, or dirty
sloppy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Ann was dressed in a sloppy brown sweater.
sloppy.translation[0].definitions[2].def: expressing feelings of love too strongly and in a silly way
sloppy.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The film is a sloppy romance.
